ML_AA_NAMES.AA_NAME: Pension and Disability Insurance Fund of Macedonia

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: Pension and Disability Insurance Fund of Macedonia

TITLE_CONTRACT.P: Procurement of service for diligence of licensed Microsoft products

LOCATION.P: In the premises of the Contracting Authority

SHORT_CONTRACT_DESCRIPTION.P: The object of procurement is undividable. Detailed description on the subject purchase is contained in the technical specifications.

ECONOMIC_OPERATORS_PERSONAL_SITUATION.P: — Written statement signed by the Economic Operator, declaring that within the past five years, no effective court decision has been imposed on it for participation in criminal organisation, corruption, fraud or money laundry,
— Confirmation Letter issued by a competent authority, certifying that no bankruptcy procedure has been raised,
— Confirmation Letter issued by a competent authority, certifying that no liquidation procedure has been raised.
— Confirmation Letter certifying paid taxes, contributions and other public duties, as issued by a competent authority of the country where the Economic Operator has been registered,

— Confirmation Letter issued by the Register of Criminal Offences of Legal Entities, certifying that no subsidiary prohibition has been imposed on it for participating in public tender procedures, being awarded public procurement contracts, as well as public-private partnership contracts thereof,

— Confirmation Letter issued by the Register of Criminal Offences of Legal Entities, certifying that no subsidiary temporary or permanent prohibition has been imposed on it for exercising specific activity,

— Confirmation Letter certifying that no effective court decision has been imposed on it prohibiting it to exercise occupation, activity or duty, or temporary prohibition to exercise a specific activity thereof.

The Economic Operator is invited to submit a Document on Registered Activity, certifying that it has been registered as a natural person or legal entity to exercise an activity that corresponds to the object of the Public Procurement Contract, or any evidence whatsoever certifying that it is a member of appropriate professional association as per the regulations of the country where it has been registered.

T_CAPACITY_INFORMATION.P: — List of major deliveries made by the Economic Operator (List of References) of similar or larger type and volume in the past 3 years, including values, dates and buyers, by providing confirmation letters of deliveries made, as issued by the recipients,

— List of certified employees or hired experts, who shall take part in the Contract implementation. CV Letters and certificates should be submitted for each team member, accompanied by evidence, that is, contracts of regular service or contracts concluded with hired experts,
— Evidence/Statement on possession of application system for monitoring and tracking work activities to support the IT infrastructure of various companies,
— Evidence/Statement of the manufacturer that the bidder holds a Microsoft LSP status (Licensing Solution Partner) for large users.

T_CAPACITY_MIN_LEVEL.P: — At least 1 delivery of software through Microsoft LSP/LAR Programme in the past three years,

— The Economic Operator should ensure a team of employees or hired experts meeting the following requirements: at least two (2) employees or hired experts holding certificates for: Microsoft Specialist; Designing and Providing Microsoft Volume Licensing Solutions to Large Organisations; At least three (3) employees or hired experts holding certificates for: Microsoft Certified Solutions Associate; Windows Server 2008 or a newer one; at least one (1) staff member or hired expert holding a certificate for: Microsoft Certified Solutions Expert: Messaging; at least one (1) staff member or hired expert holding a Certificate for: Microsoft Certified Technology Specialist or Database Administrator: SQL Server; at least one (1) staff member or hired expert: Project Manager holding a certificate: Project Management Professional (PMP),
— The Economic Operator should possess application system for monitoring and tracking work activities to support the IT infrastructure of various companies,
— Statement made by the manufacturer that the bidder holds a Microsoft LSP status (Licensing Solution Partner) for large users.

USE_ELECTRONIC_AUCTION.P: Object of auction shall be the total price, including all costs and discounts, not including VAT. Starting price of the electronic auction shall be the lowest price from among the acceptable offers submitted in the initial stage of the procedure.

PLACE_NOT_STRUCTURED.P: 23 Oktomvri, 11, Skopje — Conference Room No. 220, second floor

EXISTENCE_AUTHORISED_PERSONS.P: The authorised representatives of the economic operators should provide power of attorney for attendance at the public opening of bids.

ADDITIONAL_INFORMATION.P: All interested economic operators may download the tender documentation from the following website: https://www.e-nabavki.gov.mk from PPES (Public Procurement Electronic System).

ORGANISATION.OFFICIALNAME: State Commission for Appeals on Public Procurements
State Commission for Appeals on Public Procurements
